name: Niko O'Hara
text: High-quality, fully customizable, individual, thin crust pizza. Where else can you go to get exactly what you want on your pizza, without sacrificing taste? ‚Ä¶More

name: Deyvon Stirgus
text: Hear me out,spicy red sauce, Gorgonzola and mozzarella with banana peppers and finished with sriracha, thank me later. Also also wonderful staff

name: Laura Meagher
text: The people at this Blaze will go above and beyond to make sure you LOVE your pizza!!! Thank you!

name: James Wilson
text: Really friendly staff! Food was very tasty and a great bargain. Cooked over the fire right in front of us while we waited! Recommend trying it.

name: Will Kaighen
text: Great outing to Blaze Pizza for the first time in my life ! What a cool idea, building your own pizza ! Definitely recommend for a comfortable and safe environment, enjoyable trip with the family :)

name: Travis Cronin
text: This place is extraordinary and spacious, the food was yummy and the rates were very fair. fast, effective service and very friendly staff. Highly recommended.

name: Andy Hernandez
text: The pizza is very good. They have a large selection of toppings. Moderate prices. Totally recommend this place.

name: Prassanth Lakshminarasimhan
text: How does pizza with no sauce taste? I found out. Not good.

name: Pat Young
text: My first order got misdelivered, so I ordered it again. The manager that came from the Old Orchard store, called me right away because he wondered why there were two orders. He immediately set it right and delivered my order quickly. He understands service!

name: novella hathcock
text: The less toppings the better you'll be able to enjoy the basic ingredients. Do not miss!!

name: Daniel Harris
text: Awesome pizzas and good customer service.

name: Theo Gay
text: This spot is the one I like best. I go to many restaurants but to this one I keep coming back again and again. The crew is very receptive and the cuisine they place on your table is so fresh and tasty. I would always prefer to have a decent meal here. I highly recommend this place.

name: Rah The RefleX
text: I definitely enjoyed my pizza from Blaze! If I have one small complaint (and it really isn't a complaint) is they don't have any beef options as a meat choice. Not everyone eats pork but, they did have chicken and turkey so, that satisfied me. It was hot, freshly prepared and flavorful.

name: Sai Charan Sundar Somarouthu
text: Everything here is excellent. The service, the place was nice and clean. Being in downtown and as I expected, there was a big line for pizza. But the staff handled it really well. Of course the pizza was really good too. I sure will come back to this place.

name: LightOfTheWorld Jesus!
text: Pizza is great for the price. Lots of options. Service is fast but the line can get pretty long depending on when you decide to eat. Employees are pretty friendly. Restaurant is clean and they have a small decent patio if you want to enjoy the weather or have a pet.

name: Jorge Garza Norrick
text: Very interesting place. Had someone greet me right as I walked in and explained what the place was all about. "Like a Subway for Pizzas".... The staff was really friendly as I worked my way down the line. The pizza was great for something ‚Ä¶More

name: JM Salgado
text: As always great service!  Don't mind the waiting in line. There food is amazing.... The flavor is what I love about this place.  The store manager has great customer service!

name: Shae Baron
text: I called and ordered for curb side pick up. There was screaming in the background so the lady had to ask for my card number 4 times. Then I called when I got there, I was put on hold and then she never came back to the phone. I never got my food or my money back.

name: Cameron Terry
text: Amazing pizza made very fast.  Came on opening day, all the staff are super friendly & fun people.  I love the build your own pizza concept.  All the ingredients are fresh and your pizza is made right in front of you and cooked in 3 ‚Ä¶More

name: A K
text: Their pizzas are thin, flavorful, and moderately priced below $10. Everyone should check out this place with great variety of pizza.

name: Christian Chase
text: I really like Blaze pizza. Sometimes I crave a more thin crust and this is the perfect choice. A few different selections and consistently good.

name: Dee T
text: I enjoyed the option to create my own pizza. The Salad and pizza combine were worth the price. Can feed two people

name: Sony steier
text: I love Blaze Pizza. The crust is thin and crispy. Lots of different style toppings for different moods. I‚Äôm a fan. That‚Äôs why when using Postmates from our hotel, we chose Blaze Pizza. That was a mistake. A 45-55 min wait time sounded fine ‚Ä¶More

text: Crispy but not tough crust, melty mozzarella, perfect with arugula and balsamic glaze.  The Dough knots were out of this world.

name: Rishika Sahajpal
text: I placed the order on grub hub at 6:01 PM on 02/13/20. After several time changes and calling the pizza was delivered at 7:37 PM. It doesn't end there. The order was WRONG. I asked for high rise dough, i got UNDERCOOKED thin crust. ‚Ä¶More
